review: Chromecast is really convenient. I have a lot of movies on my computer and got tired of running cables from my tower, across the apartment, and to my tv. This let's me easily stream the movies from my computer to my tv without any big to-do. The picture is really high quality, too.
author: Melissa White

review: Overall good product, no real complaints other than occasionally freezing
author: Rashae Petty

review: We use this every day and bring it was us on vacation.
author: Eric

review: Setup software isn't great. Had issues with 2 of these.The first one with Windows 8. Said it wasn't setup, but it was. Had to call customer service.The second with Windows XP. You can't set it up with XP, so I had to do it with my phone.Also sometimes it will have buffering issues.
author: Amazon Customer

review: still trying to figure out how to use
author: pat rtired

review: Great Technology. Works great as long as you have a strong wi-fi signal. Simple to set up, simple to use with your smart phone and tablets!
author: Joe G

review: Works great with youtube and not much more, but that could be the app's fault and not the Chromecast.
author: Amazon Customer
